column1:
1. Air map of the area
2. Magnetic compass
3. 2 litres of water per person
4. Bottle of 1000 salt tablets
5. Parachute (red & white)
6. Overcoat (for everyone)
7. 45 calibre pistol (loaded)
8. Torch with 4 battery-cells
9. Folding knife
10. Plastic raincoat (large size)
11. Sunglasses (for everyone)
12. First-aid kit
13. A book entitled ‘Desert Animals That Can Be Eaten’
14. 2 litres of 180 proof liquor
15. A cosmetic mirror
